0.muscle_description: Deadlift with stretched legs is much less popular than classic deadlift . Compared to normal deadlift, legs remain in almost straight state during exercise . This variant requires considerably less muscles than the basic exercise .
0.exercise_execution: It's not the first time he's been spotted out and about in Los Angeles in recent weeks .

1.muscle_description: Sumo deadlifting with barbells is not so much to be admired in the classic gyms, but rather in the fitness rooms of sports universities or fitness centres . Like classic deadlifting, this exercise is a fitness exercise intended to train the lower back .
1.exercise_execution: Stand in front of the barbell with your legs stretched out, your abdominal muscles are stretched and your lower back forms a slight hollow cross position . Then bend your legs and lower your upper body until your thighs are parallel to the floor .

2.muscle_description: A very exotic fitness exercise is sumo deadlifting with a dumbbell . This exercise is first done on spotting platforms of a half-rack . Afterwards, the exercise is shown on two stools, which could possibly be available in a gym or at home .
2.exercise_execution: Stand on spotter platforms or the two stools, the dumbbell stands upright . Your torso is stretched out, your eyes are straight out and your lower back forms a slight hollow back .

3.muscle_description: A very popular fitness exercise for the biceps is the exercise known in this country as Larry Scott curls . For this exercise, you need the legendary Scott curl bench and an SZ bar . Optionally, you can also use a straight barbell bar .
3.exercise_execution: Sit on the seat cushion of the Scott bench and position your legs in a firm position . Grasp the SZ bar at the inner curve in the lower part of the elbow . Press your upper body against the appropriate cushion .

4.muscle_description: Hammer curls are a very popular and therefore very common arm exercise in the gym . In contrast to biceps curls, the hammer curls hold dumbbells in a neutral grip . This grip technique makes the exercise very easy to do .
4.exercise_execution: Sit upright or sit on a flat bench or similar object . Your arms and dumbbells hang down at the sides of your body, but they are slightly bent and not straight . Now exhale and bend your forearms up to the maximum via the elbow joint . Afterwards, breathe in and simultaneously lower the dumbbell back to the starting position .

5.muscle_description: You can simply do the Scottcurls on an incline bench and a dumbbell . Even if your gym does not have a Scott bench, you do not have to do without .
5.exercise_execution: In order to keep the upper body upright despite the low height of the pad, you go with your legs in a static step . The lower back forms a slight hollow back; this protects your intervertebral discs . Do not stretch the arm completely, but keep it slightly bent .

6.muscle_description: Pullovers (also: covers) can also be done with a barbell . It is advantageous to have a flat bench available and not to have to do this on the floor . It trains the chest muscle and the saw muscle .
6.exercise_execution: You start the sweaters by slowly lowering the barbell above your head in a controlled way on your almost stretched arms . During this process, you inhale . At the end of this movement, you feel the muscle tension clearly increase .

7.muscle_description: The Butterfly machine is one of the most popular machines in gyms due to its easy execution of movements and thus quick learnability . Whether men or women, this machine is constantly occupied .
7.exercise_execution: Sit on the seat cushion of the Butterfly machine and press your buttocks and upper back against the back cushion . Your legs are spread and bent on the floor to give you optimum support . Your arms are not fully stretched, but slightly bent at the elbow .

8.muscle_description: Not all studios have an incline bench in the barbell, this exercise has become a classic . The focus of this exercise is on training the collarbone fibres of the large pectoral muscle .
8.exercise_execution: If you put the dumbbells on your thighs with one side of the plates, you can raise them slightly to chest level by a successive upward movement of the thighs . Arms are bent and the forearms point vertically upwards . As you exhale, you extend your arms upwards .

9.muscle_description: Triceps press is the triceps press above the head with the barbell or the SZ bar . In principle, an SZ is recommended for doing the exercise to protect the wrists .
9.exercise_execution: Grab an SZ bar at the inner bar section in the upper grip and sit on a flat bench . It is best to position your feet slightly splayed with a 90 degree angle between your lower and upper legs on the floor . Arch your lower back slightly forward into a slight hollow cross to relieve your intervertebral discs .

10.exercise_title: One-arm triceps press on cable pulley
10.muscle_description: Those who are looking for a diversion from one-armed triceps press with dumbbell can also do the same exercise on the cable pull tower .
10.exercise_execution: Stand upright with your shoulders pulled backwards and chest stretched forward . Make a slight hollow back in your lower back and flex your abdominal muscles . Support your passive arm at your hip and lower your active arm with the grip piece up so that your upper arm is placed right next to your ear .

11.exercise_title: Triceps press above the head on cable pulley
11.muscle_description: Triceps press over the head with the back to the cable pull tower . Another version of the triceps press is the triceice press .
11.exercise_execution: Your lower back forms a slight hollow back to protect your intervertebral discs . Grasp the rope (or grip piece) in a neutral grip position and stand with your back to the cable control tower .

12.muscle_description: The most well-known training method for the inside of the thighs is probably the training with the adductor machine . In most gyms, this device is found in combination with the abduction machine, which trains the lateral gluteal muscles .
12.exercise_execution: It's not the first time he's been spotted out and about in Los Angeles in recent weeks .

13.muscle_description: Sitting calf lifting with a barbell bar or an SZ bar tends to be less common in the gym . However, those who do not have this device at their disposal can easily simulate the movement with a flat bench .
13.exercise_execution: It's not the first time he's been spotted out and about in Los Angeles in recent weeks .

14.muscle_description: This exercise is easiest to do when you place a barbell on a power rack . If necessary, this exercise can also be done on a flat bench or under a table . It is only important that you can hold yourself somewhere and pull yourself up .
14.exercise_execution: It's not the first time he's been spotted out and about in Los Angeles in recent weeks .

15.muscle_description: The dumbbell shoulder press is probably the most popular exercise for the shoulder muscles . The focus of this exercise is mainly on the middle part of the deltoid muscle (musculus deltoideus pars acromialis)
15.exercise_execution: As you exhale, lift the dumbbells up and bring them together above your head . Note that even in this exercise, the arms in the elbow joint are not fully stretched out .

16.muscle_description: A rarely observed variant of front lifting is front lifting on an incline bench . By fixing the torso, falsification with the torso is hardly possible . This exercise is suitable for users who work with high weights .
16.exercise_execution: With dumbbell in your hands, you lie with your chest on an inclined bench . Your arms hang down vertically with a slight bend in the elbow joint . With your feet you support yourself on the floor so that your upper body is relatively fixed and rigid .

17.muscle_description: Handstand Push Ups are a body weight exercise that has become popular thanks to Crossfit and Freeletics . It is a variation of the classic push-ups that are done in a handstand .
17.exercise_execution: It's not the first time he's been spotted out and about in Los Angeles in recent weeks .
